'''"My Treasure"''' belonging to [[Klee]] is buried here, but it is stolen by an [[Abyss Mage]] during the events of her [[Story Quest]], "[[The Mystery of the Girl in Red's Treasure]]." Interacting with the empty hole after completing the quest gives the following dialogue:
{{Dialogue start}}
'''"My Treasure":''' There's some scruffy handwriting on this wooden post: "My Treasure."
{{dialogue end}}
